resources.string: Welcome to Capture Mode. This feature allows you to record your tracks by capturing all sounds from your phone.
Your recordings will be saved to your library with the prefix \'Captured-\', where you can play, rename, share, select as a QuickSound, or delete them at your convenience.
Please note that this mode requires additional screen cast permission before you can start!
You can press \'Next mode button\' or swipe left on the bottom panel to enter Mic recording mode.
Welcome to Mic Recording Mode. In this mode, you can record your voice or live instruments using your phone\'s microphone.
Your recordings will be saved to your library with the prefix \'MicRecorded-\', where you can play, rename, share, select as a QuickSound, or delete them at your convenience.
Please note that this mode requires basic audio recording permission and will not function while screen capturing is in progress!
Press \'Next mode button\' or swipe left on the bottom panel to enter sequencer recording mode.
Press \'Prev mode button\' or swipe right on the bottom panel to return to capturing mode.
Welcome to Sequencer Recording Mode. In this mode, AndroidBand will track your interactions with the samples and allow you to replay or consolidate them into a single file.

After recording, you can press the \'Render button\' to merge your actions into one file. This file, prefixed with \'Rendered-\', will be added to your library, where you can play, rename, share, select as a QuickSound, or delete them at your convenience.
This mode does not require any additional permissions, but please note that changes to the sample\'s speed or volume, as well as the addition of new samples, are not permitted during recording!
Press \'Prev mode button\' or swipe right on the bottom panel to return to Mic recording mode.
Request to start capturing denied! We can\'t record audio without it.

We deeply respect your privacy, and we assure you that we will never record without your explicit consent. However, in order to enable the functionality of audio track capturing, we require your permission for audio recording and screen casting.
We value your privacy and will never record you without your express consent. However, we do require your permission for audio recording in order to provide live recordings.

We have great respect for your privacy and will never record sound without your explicit consent. However, permission to record sound is required for the sound visualiser to work properly. If you refuse, the visualiser may not work as intended, but the rest of the application will remain functional. You can grant this permission later, but note that you will need to restart the application for the visualiser to work correctly.
